alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 3:14AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Ashtabula...southwestern Erie and western Crawford Counties Until 400 AM EST.... At 311 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band near North Kingsville, extending southeast towards Conneaut Lake. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Meadville, Conneaut, North Kingsville, Linesville, Harmonsburg, Adamsville, Pymatuning North, Pymatuning Central, Atlantic, Kingsville, Pierpont, Cochranton, Conneautville, Conneaut Lake, Springboro, Edgewood, Plymouth Center, Conneaut Lakeshore, and Geneva. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band, including motorists traveling on Interstate 90. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
